column4: <dalyn> moduliz0r: how do i get to terminal? i just started ubuntu today ;/ CLASSIC example... he is trying to install WINE before he even knows what the terminal is
yes, 10 000 human beings spamming this channel with ignorance
that question was asked about 1000 users when there were only about 300 idling; the answer is the same: explain

I would be willing to bet money that either this channel had similar traffic due to the hype of the OS initially, and was filled with more experienced users, as most 'newbies' these days get linux because some one said its 'easy'
heh. The quality level of questions now is well above then; I could answer most then, hardly any now :)
If I had a system without important data on it, I'd be a little more careless and probably learn a lot :P
you will need to remove totem-mozilla as well
what does about:plugins say in firefox?
I have both VLC plugin and Quicktime plugin enabled
I have both VLC and quicktime plugin enabled
remove mozilla-plugin-vlc , totem-mozilla , install mozilla-mplayer, and go to https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Medibuntu#head-381bea41610683e5e26322fd7028e7aef85e3105-2 to get the codecs
